SELECT GIRO_NO , GIRO_DP_MTR_DV_CD , DP_SN -- 일련번호 , FNT_DT --이체일자 , RVE_DT --수납일자 , GIRO_DP_BNK_CD --은행코드 , GIRO_INQNO --지로조회번호 , CNTR_NO --계약번호 , 1 AS CNTR_SN
--, LPAD(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CNTR_NO ORDER BY DP_SN DESC ),5,0) AS CNTR_SN --계약일련번호 , PY_TN --회차 , (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PY_YM,1,2)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER('20' || PY_YM) END) AS PY_YM /*납입년월 */ , PY_AMT --납입금액 , GIRO_FEE_DV_CD --지로수수료 , GIRO_RVE_DV_CD --수납구분 , DTA_DL_YN , #{session.companyCode}
FROM( SELECT
( SELECT SUBSTR(DP_SN,3,5) || SUBSTR(RVE_DT,1,2) FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_DP_LEDG_IZ /* 지로입금 원시파일 */ WHERE GIRO_DP_MTR_DV_CD = '11' /* 구분코드 */ AND GIRO_DP_ULD_PROCS_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS GIRO_NO --지로번호 , GIRO_DP_MTR_DV_CD --구분코드 , DP_SN -- 일련번호 , FNT_DT --이체일자 , RVE_DT --수납일자 , GIRO_DP_BNK_CD --은행코드 , GIRO_INQNO --지로조회번호 , CASE WHEN GIRO_RVE_DV_CD IN ( 'R','A' ) OR GIRO_INQNO = ' ' THEN '0' WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,5,1) = '-' THEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,4) WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,9) = '000000000' THEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,10,4) ELSE 'W'||SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,3,11) END CNTR_NO /*계약번호 */ -- , CASE WHEN GIRO_RVE_DV_CD IN ( 'R','A' ) OR GIRO_INQNO = ' ' THEN '0' -- WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,5,1) = '-' THEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,4) -- WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,9) = '000000000' THEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,10,4) -- ELSE SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,3,12) END CNTR_NO /*계약번호 */ , CASE WHEN GIRO_RVE_DV_CD IN ( 'R','A' ) OR GIRO_INQNO = ' ' THEN '0' WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,5,1) = '-' THEN '0' WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,9) = '000000000' THEN '0' ELSE SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,14,2) END PY_TN --납입회차 , CASE WHEN GIRO_RVE_DV_CD IN ( 'R','A' ) OR GIRO_INQNO = ' ' THEN '0' WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,5,1) = '-' THEN '0' WHEN SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,1,9) = '000000000' THEN '0' ELSE SUBSTR(GIRO_INQNO,16,4) END PY_YM /*납입년월 */ , PY_AMT --납입금액 , GIRO_FEE_DV_CD--지로수수료 , GIRO_RVE_DV_CD -- 수납구분 , DTA_DL_YN FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_DP_LEDG_IZ WHERE GIRO_DP_MTR_DV_CD = '22' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND GIRO_DP_ULD_PROCS_YN = 'N' ) T1

SELECT ITG_DP_NO , GIRO_NO , GIRO_DP_MTR_DV_CD , GIRO_DP_SN , FNT_DT , RVE_DT , GIRO_DP_BNK_CD , GIRO_DP_NO , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PY_TN , PY_YM , PY_AMT , GIRO_FEE , GIRO_RVE_DV_CD , GIRO_PRTS_DV_CD , PROCS_ERR_TP_CD , DTA_DL_YN FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_DP_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND GIRO_NO = '3010068' /* 지로번호*/ AND FNT_DT = #{fntDt} AND RVE_DT = #{rveDt} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.BASE_PD_CD , T1.PD_HCLSF_ID , T1.PD_MCLSF_ID , T1.PD_LCLSF_ID , T1.PD_DCLSF_ID , T2.CNTR_CST_NO , T2.CNTR_CAN_DTM , T1.SELL_TP_CD , T1.SELL_TP_DTL_CD , T1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = '2'

SELECT NVL(SUM(DP_SE_AMT),0) AS DP_SE_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_OCR_BNDL_BAS A INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B ON A.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN WHERE 1 = 1 AND GIRO_OCR_BNDL_YM = #{giroOcrBndlYm} AND DG_CNTR_NO = #{dgCntrNo} AND DG_CNTR_SN = #{dgCntrSn} AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101'

SELECT DP_SE_AMT , DG_CNTR_NO , DG_CNTR_SN , DP_SE_AMT , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_OCR_BNDL_BAS A INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B ON A.CNTR_NO = B.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = B.CNTR_SN WHERE 1 = 1 AND GIRO_OCR_BNDL_YM = #{giroOcrBndlYm} AND DG_CNTR_NO = #{dgCntrNo} AND DG_CNTR_SN = #{dgCntrSn} AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101'
SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD --계약상태코드 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(#{rveDt} , 7 , 2) <= ( SELECT MIN(A2.BASE_D) FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS A2 WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND NVL(A2.DF_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND NVL(A2.PHLD_YN, 'N') <> 'Y' AND A2.BASE_Y = SUBSTR(#{rveDt} , 0 , 4) AND A2.BASE_MM = SUBSTR(#{rveDt} , 5 , 2) AND A2.DOW_DV_CD NOT IN ('1', '7') ) THEN (SELECT A2.BASE_Y || A2.BASE_MM || MAX(A2.BASE_D) FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS A2 WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A2.BASE_Y = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{rveDt}), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYY') AND A2.BASE_MM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{rveDt}), 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'MM') GROUP BY A2.BASE_Y, A2.BASE_MM ) ELSE #{rveDt} END FROM DUAL /* 대사에서 사용할 실적일자 및 입금일자*/

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO ||'-'|| T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR , T2.CNTR_CST_NO AS CST_NO , (SELECT S1.CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CST_NO = T2.CNTR_CST_NO AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) AS CST_KNM FROM TB_RVDW_GIRO_OCR_PBL_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.GIRO_NO = #{giroNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
